author: Megan Rose Dickey
title: Target’s Shipt shoppers are walking off work today
description: Shipt shoppers, which began organizing in February, are staging their first action today. Yesterday, a group of Shipt shoppers, who shop and deliver orders from Target and other stores, announced their plans to walk off today. The walk-off is in protest of th…
